title: Ticket #1144: Gridmanager should auto-detect gram5 resources
description:
GRAM5 (introduced in Globus 5.0) is a mostly backwards-compatible extension of GRAM2. For Condor to interact properly with both GRAM2 and GRAM5 resources, it must know which are which. Currently, we rely on the job submitter to tell us via the GridResource attribute. The GRAM5 client library provides a method to let the gridmanager determine this for itself. The GT2/GT5 GAHP should be extended to exppose it and the gridmanager should use it.

Milestones

  • Add GAHP command for GRAM5 version query function
  • Gridmanager uses version query function
remarks:

In Globus 5.0.0, there's only a blocking version of the version query function. We'll have to make due with that until a non-blocking form is added in a later version.

2010-Feb-02 10:35:09 by jfrey:
Pushed commits to enable this feature to master for 7.5.1. The blocking version of the gram client function is currently used.
